body_html: We found that, and it looked easy, because all the hard work with RedCarpet and the config is already there. But, my problem was: we don't have a show view, because of the find_or_create_by. Do you mean that it still is solvable without JavaScript? Then I'll look at it again.
body_text: We found that, and it looked easy, because all the hard work with RedCarpet and the config is already there. But, my problem was: we don't have a show view, because of the find_or_create_by. Do you mean that it still is solvable without JavaScript? Then I'll look at it again.
body: We found that, and it looked easy, because all the hard work with RedCarpet and the config is already there. But, my problem was: we don't have a show view, because of the find_or_create_by. Do you mean that it still is solvable without JavaScript? Then I'll look at it again.
